column1: Columns: [CAASPP Assessment Results by Student Group
Smarter Balanced Summative Assessment and the CAA.  The
“Percent Met or Exceeded” is calculated by taking the total
number of students who met or exceeded the standard on
the Smarter Balanced Summative Assessment plus the total
Level 3–Alternate) on the CAAs divided by the total number
of students who participated in both assessments.
Note: The number of students tested includes all students
who participated in the test whether they received a score or
calculated using only students who received scores.]
